name: Kim SMITH, Appellant v. PA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, State Correctional Institution Coal Township, State Correctional Institution Smithfield, Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Smith v. PA. Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Kim SMITH, Appellant v. PA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, State Correctional Institution Coal Township, State Correctional Institution Smithfield, Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of October, 2003, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
884 A.2d 1139
Kim SMITH, Appellant v. PA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, State Correctional Institution Coal Township, State Correctional Institution Smithfield, Department of Corrections, Appellees.

Oct. 31, 2003.
